channel.title: Run error (508)
channel.description:
hey I have a 508 client changer and everytime I run i get this. Please help. I have java 6 update 7
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Run error (508)
item.dc:creator: @sexy_bobert sexy bobert
item.description:
@sexy_bobert wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:4, topic:258005”][quote author=sexy bobert link=topic=340628.msg2638397#msg2638397 date=1232680427]
You might wanna download a different source. And just wondering, did you set up 508 Cache?
[/quote]

The cache doesn’t have to do with this.

As 508s don’t have a client.java, there is no client.class. Obviously your client is trying to start using the client class. But it can’t, because there isn’t one.[/quote]
Oh, haha… I only ran 508’s for a month. But The Cache part was just to make sure he knew what he was doing.

Read full topic
